original_text: So Aaron took it as Moses said and ran into the midst of the assembly. And behold, the plague had already begun among the people. And he put on the incense and made atonement for the people.
korean_text: 아론이 모세의 명령을 따라 향로를 가지고 회중에게로 달려간즉 백성 중에 염병이 시작되었는지라 이에 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: So Aaron took it as Moses said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아론은 모세가 말한 대로 그것을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and ran into the midst of the assembly.
the plague had already begun among the people.
And he put on the incense
and made atonement for the people.
